post.title: Can I use the generated site address/private key to accept Bitcoin payments?
post.body:
Yes, it's a standard Bitcoin address. The private key is WIF formatted, so you can import it in most clients.


Tip: It's not recommended to keep a high amount of money on your site's address, because you have to enter your private key every time you modify your site.

post.body: 在所有学习中，风格的学习最难。今后会有专门的主题，专门研究风格的学习和写作。

post.title: 写作方法：模仿大师的写作
post.body:
读，并且模仿大师的写作是最好的学习写作的方法之一。你可以：
- 集中精力读一段，把他吃透，然后模仿；
- 模仿文字，模仿观点，模仿风格；

post.body:
这对男人很重要。求爱信并不一定长，和你的器官不同，不一定越大越长越好。文字的动人不是靠尺寸。

关键是对语言和语境的精准把握和表达。

学习些求爱信，gg go, go gg.

post.title: 如何高效地学习写作
post.body:
学则有用的东西，实用的东西写。比方说：

- 你需要写的一封电子邮件；
- 你需要给老板写的报告和总结；
- 你想写的求爱信；

post.title: 写的好的范例
post.body: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Cp4hRjbEq3GmTt74ooSTDNia2uvsKCUU

post.title: 写的好的基本标准是什么
post.body:
- 精准表达
- 结构清晰
- 动人
- 内涵丰厚
- 说服力强

post.title: 阅读和写作的关系
post.body:
- 除了写作本身，阅读最写作的帮助最大；
- 一切都从模仿开始；写作也一样；先读，然后模仿别人写；
- 一旦你自己开始写，你会更能欣赏别人为什么写的精彩；

post.title: 口语和写作的关系
post.body:
- 口语代替不了写作；
- 写作更多的是书面语言，不只是日常表达；
- 写作需要专门训练学习；
- 写作多了会对你的口语精准表达有巨大帮助；

post.title: 如何学习英语写作
post.body:
- 找好书阅读；经典的好书很多，从任何一本开始都行；比方说，下面这本书：
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Cp4hRjbEq3GmTt74ooSTDNia2uvsKCUU
- 开始写；写什么都行；
- 有老师指点，这点非常重要；
- 每次不求多，学习到一点就很丰厚；
- 持之以恒；
- 多用英语写作和交流；

how i can join you?

SAT is a sophisticated thing. not many people are truly qualified for the teaching task. it is a skill, not a matter of nativeness of language.

so talk to this guy, doctorz, he is a guru in these things. go to his office, now - 

http://127.0.0.1:43110/18on2beXadyCe5GvAYq6sVXD9ejwRLXShd/

post.title: bad language? my own style? then how about exams?
post.body:
all of our exams will be build not to test your ability to conform to the norm but the other way around. yes the other way around. if there are tests, these tests are designed to measure your creativity, your skills of learning, and your ability of appreciating others. so do not worry about our own exams here on 34.

but how about SAT? toefl?GCSE? and so on and off?

that is a chance to learn how to understand and apprecicate others. all those exams are designed by someone just like you and me. by setting up right or wrong in those exams, others have set rules for a game. that is all. a game. you learn the rule, and play the game, and play it well. 

so work hard on those exams, complying with their rules, play their games and win.

post.title: create your own language
post.body: language is a just a tool, use it to your advantage and convenience. we should not be constrained by many rules, not the least by that of language. most often we find it hard to find a word to be accurate, reflexive, colorful. then, create your own way of writing. four letter word will be filtered out then change it to three.  your own style will be the most truthful and beautiful style.

post.title: informality
post.body:
there is no need for formality here. it is hard, maintaining your formality in your real world life is hard enough. so here we make it easy for all of us. no formality is the best formality here. 

whatever you want to say, say it. we are here to hear.

post.title: be a bad writer
post.body:
in other colleges you are taught to write well. but writing well is hard. so here we make it easy, bad writers are welcome. 

bad writers, that is us. most of us will remain bad for life. but we want to speak. so here is your place, write out, speak up, talk down. your word has its place and effect.

post.title: if there is one rule, this is the one, the only one.
post.body: be lawful.

post.title: here we do not ask
post.body:
we do not ask who you are. what we care most is what you think and why. so we appreciate your thought, so we all can learn and enjoy togetther. your status, your real physicalities, most of us we do not care.

by not knowing who you are and who we are, we relax. we speak our real thoughts. and that is benificial to all.

relax, speak out, and see how the world evolve and boil intriqued by your little thought.

post.title: how you can use your blog?
at 34, you are the center of the world
post.body:
- in other places such as this book or that, you are sactioned and need to be approved by someone you have no fuking clue. there, whatever you do and say can be hacked or deleted; if that is the case, why you bother say what you say? there, you have a fuking big brother.
- here, you are the center. you take full control of your own world. everything else can come to you, but what belongs to you stay with you and you only. you create your content, you say what you want to say, you take the full responsibility yourself.
- here, whatever you write down stores on your computer. nobody can delete what you say, period. you can simply leave it to your son to review, and pick up your keystrokes and continue to write if he wants. 
- here you are building your own self, your own traaditon, your own culture, your own history. probably for the first time in history, what you say matters, no matter honw fuking small you are.

post.title: best way of learing on College34
best practice when using your site and publish articles
post.body:
- it is common 34ers try to register other userids and maintian different sites; why not, given it is so easy to clone new sites, 34ers can easily create diff sites to hold different topics and themes and initiatives. we all have many faces, put them on diff sites we avoid confuse others. 
- but when you manage diff sites, try not to write on the same site on different data folders. when you do that often, it creates certain problems for sync. becuase there is no central server, what you write in one data location relies upon peers to update first and then propagate to others. if you write something, quit the current folder and leave to another folder, and write again on the same blog site, that creates problem of sync. try avoid this situation.
- so, as much as possiblem, work in the same data folder for one particular site.

post.title: some important tech note when you use your blog
post.body:
- always make sure your site can be updated without error, for example, without error like "1 file update failed"
- if you have error when updating your site, you should try to solve that first before you write new articles and publish. fix the problem first, then write and add new content. 
- how do i know my site is published and working properly? 

you can do this easily by checking on the public proxies, for example, for this College34 homepage blog, you can check and see if it is the same on public proxy as you see now on your local machine:

https://zeroproxy.atomike.ninja/1Mr11twqYfgYE8DGB6USc3QqvGwiqjmzqt/

- regarding to how to fix problems related to updating and so on, refer to our technical guide site.


thank you and enjoy.

the College34 tech team

post.title: advanced topic - how to register your own .bit domain
post.body:
first, check if your desired domain name is available, for example you can check it online here - 

https://www.domaincoin.net/

before you reginster your domain name, also please do some study and know more about it, here are some general info-

https://wiki.namecoin.info/index.php?title=Register_and_Configure_.bit_Domains

You can register .bit domains using Namecoin. Manage your domains using the client's GUI or by the command line interface.

After the registration is done you have to edit your domain's record by adding a zeronet section to it, eg.:
{
...
    "zeronet": {
        "": "1EU1tbG9oC1A8jz2ouVwGZyQ5asrNsE4Vr",
        "blog": "1BLogC9LN4oPDcruNz3qo1ysa133E9AGg8",
        "talk": "1TaLk3zM7ZRskJvrh3ZNCDVGXvkJusPKQ"
    },
...
}


"" means the top domain, any other that is a sub-domain.


Tip: Other possibilities to register .bit domains: domaincoin.net, peername.com, dotbit.me

Tip: You can verify your domain on namecha.in, for example: zeroid.bit

Tip: You should use only lower-cased letters, numbers and - in your domains.

Tip: To make ZeroHello to link your domain instead of your site's address, add a domain key to your content.json. (Example)

post.title: english study and exam preparation center
post.body:
language sets the most important foundation for your future growth. so we strongly encourage you to study language, not just english, but preferably one other language such as chinese, and computer language such as python or go.

here is a list of good language study best practice:
- study it everyday
- use it everyday
- set a goal, start a project, or use it to communicate with others
- never stop learning
- if you prepare for exam, then do a lot of sample exams

if you have any qustion, we are here eager to help. so, please be free and drop us a note.

post.title: what you can do and what you can not do
post.body:
let's use common sense here. let's always try to be nice and respectful to others. with this in mind, you can pretty much do anything you like.

enjoy, be free.

post.title: what are the typical things i can do here
how it will be administered
post.body:
there is no constitution of any kind, so far. 

but if there is a need for one in the future, let's make one.

post.title: why it is called 34
post.body: well, it is pretty obcious.

post.title: how about tuition and so on
post.body: it is free. absolutely free.

post.title: is there is a president for college 34
post.body:
currently, no. 

but if someday there is a need for one, then we can pick one.

post.title: who runs 34
post.body:
all of you together, we are running it together. but each one is truly independent, in every sense.

for example, whatever you have created here, including your homepage, your writings and your content of everykind, can not be controlled and deleted by amubody else. you have the absolute freedom.

but one important message for you - because of this absolute freedom, it comes with a responsibility to yourself and others. so whatever you do, be responsible. take care.

post.title: who should join us
post.body: really, it is everyone we are welcome. but in particular, we think we are useful to those who want to learn, to communicate with others, to do some useful things for this world community.

post.title: how you can join us
post.body:
- first download this software, run it;
- register your id through zeroid.bit
- create your first homepage, just like this one
- then stop by any of our sites, and drop a note there, you are in. welcome.

post.title: what technologies we rely upon most
post.body:
- internets of many kinds, including: .com net, zeronet
- computers of all kinds, such as what you are using now
- computer programs of all kinds
- we actively invent new technologies

post.title: how we learn
post.body:
- from each other
- by inventing good technologies and these technologies help us learn
- learn by each individual self (try to allocate at least 50% of your time learn this way)
- we never limit our imagination and creativity, so we invent new ways to learn, constantly

post.title: what we care most
post.body:
of course learning. but there are many others we care deeply. the most important ones are:

- try to do the right thing
- promote peace
- respect each other
- make human live better

post.title: what language we use
post.body:
we use all human langugages. these include:

- english
- chinese
- french
- german
- spanish
- japanese
- korean
- all computer languages
- or a language you are inventing now
- and so on and on

post.title: who are our partners
post.body:
- all legal human institutions are our partners. these include typically the following:
- universities and colleges from around the world
- all schools of all kinds from around the world
- all research institutes from around the world
- many companies
- many organizations

post.title: who we are and what we do
post.body:
we are students and teachers from around the world. we want to learn from each other, learn from nature, learn from god, and help build a better human society.

what we do is simple - learn together. 

join us.

post.title: hello world.
post.body: June 1, 2016, children's day.

post.title: Congratulations!
post.body:
Your zeronet blog has been successfully created!
all info is located on the folder 24v1 on the office computer.
